mid_core.title: Courier Message July 12th - 23:49
mid_core.content:
From: redwing@protonmail.com
To: frostpoint@securemail.cz
Subject: YHF

Use the old wall with the gate — follow the wall until you reach the bastion. It's secluded, dry and out of sight. Can’t see it unless you’re right next to the marker. Remember, listen to the station, find the middle point. Use the map.

mid_core.title: Tapped phonecall July 10th - 11:07
mid_core.content:
Male Voice 1:
-You sure you've found the right place?
Male Voice 2:
-Has to be. Narrow as hell. Lines cross right above it.
Male Voice 1:
-Isn't that area too busy?
-CONNECTION LOST-

content.text: Recording of a short wave radio signal. It's a known number station that recently became active again. Relevance: pending analysis.

images.description: Blurry photo of what looks like a bird carving on a stone wall. Possibly a marking indicating the drop location. Relevance high
Tight alleyway with pedestrian signal. May lead to drop zone or be part of approach route.
A screenshot of a map of Prague with markings on it. Relevance high
Corrupted photo of Ruins on a hilltop. May be unrelated or an old access point.

content.data: Wklv lv wkh iluvw whvw ri wkh ghdg gurs phvvdjh
content.description: Encrypted memo believed to contain the location of the drop. Try decrypting it with the decryption tool.
